page.title: 17CHILDREN'S LEISURE
page.content: WE SURVEYED 64 CHILDREN BETWEEN THE AGES OF 8 AND 10 YEARS TO FIND WHAT THEY ENJOYED DOING IN THEIR SPARE TIME. HERE ARE OUR RESULTS:- FOOTBALL 28 MUSICAL INSTRUMENTS 35 CHESS 18 LISTENING TO MUSIC 41 MARBLES 39 WATCHING T.V. 59 ATHLETICS 35 STAMP COLLECTING 22 READING 50 CUBS/BROWNIES 29 DANCING 13 RIDING BIKE 53 SWIMMING 45 GYMNASTICS 29 SNOOKER 26 YOUTH CLUB 16 FROM THIS WE DECIDED THAT WE MUST LIVE IN QUITE AN AFFLUENT AREA. MOST CHILDREN PREFER OUTDOOR ACTIVITIES WHEN THE WEATHER PERMITS. THERE ARE VARIED INTERESTS RANGING FROM ORGANISED PERSUITS TO PERSONALLY INITIATED HOBBIES. WE CONCLUDED THAT MANY ADULTS ARE PREPARED TO SPEND THEIR OWN LEISURE TIME TO HELP CHILDREN PERSUE THEIR OWN INTERESTS.
